attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Smoking is a human right so why do the government have the right to dictate where people can and cant smoke? It is an outrage. you are banning smoking for smokers but what are you banning for none smokers. 

It is completly unfair and more people will probably carry on or start smoking just to go against what Tony Blair has to say. 

Its unfair in airports because its bad enought smokers cannot smoke the duration of the fight yet now they cannot smoke after going through security because you cannot smoke inside. This is an outrage.
Ban the smoking ban in places like airports.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
